TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 包含列中每一项的超链接的 控件的列类型。

span.span: A column type for the control that contains a hyperlink for each item in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件中的列类型, 为中的每行创建超链接。Use the column type in a control to create a hyperlink for each row in the . 设置属性以指定超链接的标题文本。Set the property to specify the caption text for the hyperlink. 若要指定在单击超链接时链接到的 URL, 请设置属性。To specify the URL to link to when the hyperlink is clicked, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置了和属性, 则列中的所有超链接都将共享相同的标题和 URL。If you set the and properties, all hyperlinks in the column will share the same caption and URL. 还可以将中的超链接的文本标题和 URL 绑定到数据源中的字段, 而不是设置和属性。You can also bind the text caption and URL of the hyperlinks in the to a field in a data source instead of setting the and properties. 这允许您显示不同的标题, 并为列中的每个超链接指定不同的 URL。This allows you to display a different caption and to specify a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 使用属性可指定数据源中要绑定到列中超链接的文本标题的字段。Use the property to specify a field in a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 通过设置属性来指定要绑定到超链接的 URL 的字段。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlink by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 属性允许您指定窗口或框架, 以便在单击超链接时显示链接到的网页内容。The property allows you to specify the window or frame to display the Web page content linked to when the hyperlink is clicked. 使用数据绑定时, 可以分别通过设置和属性来设置超链接的文本标题和 URL 的格式。When using data binding, you can format the text caption and URL of the hyperlink by setting the and properties, respectively. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入, 其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前, 请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. 您可以使用验证控件在显示控件中的输入文本之前验证用户输入。You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保护标准控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [如何:通过将 HTML 编码应用到字符串](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), 并[在 ASP.NET 网页中验证用户输入](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)来防范 Web 应用程序中的脚本攻击。For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建链接到单独页面的。The following example demonstrates how to create a that links to a separate page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 以下相应示例显示了上一示例中所选的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的 URL 的字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的 URL 的字段。

span.span: The field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定数据源中要绑定到中的超链接的 URL 的字段。 Use the property to specify the field from a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 当 URL 数据绑定到字段时, 将使用指定字段中的相应值设置列中每个超链接的 URL。When the URL is data bound to a field, the URL of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 这允许您为列中的每个超链接设置不同的 URL。This allows you to set a different URL for each hyperlink in the column. 若要为列中的每一行指定相同的 URL, 请设置属性, 而不是设置此属性。To specify the same URL for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 使用数据绑定时, 可以通过设置属性为超链接的 URL 指定自定义的显示格式。When you are using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定数据源中要绑定到中的超链接的 URL 的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in a data source to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 以下相应示例显示了上一示例中所选的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. summary.span: 获取或设置当 URL 数据绑定到数据源中的字段时， 中的超链接的 URL 的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 字符串，指定当 URL 数据绑定到数据源中的字段时， 中的超链接的 URL 的显示格式。

span.span: The string that specifies the display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为中的超链接的 URL 提供自定义的显示格式。 Use the property to provide a custom display format for the URL of the hyperlinks in the . 仅当 URL 数据绑定到数据源中的字段时, 才会将指定的格式应用到 URL。The specified format is only applied to the URL when the URL is data-bound to a field in a data source. 通过设置属性, 指定要绑定到列中超链接的 URL 的字段。Specify the field to bind to the URL of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 有关格式字符串的语法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性设置中的数据绑定超链接的格式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 获取或设置数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的文本标题的字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the field from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the .

value.span: 数据源中要绑定到 中的超链接的文本标题的字段名称。

span.span: The field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定数据源中要绑定到中的超链接的文本标题的字段名称。 Use the property to specify the field name from a data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in . 当文本标题被数据绑定到字段时, 将使用指定字段中的相应值设置列中每个超链接的文本标题。When the text caption is data bound to a field, the text caption of each hyperlink in the column is set with a corresponding value in the specified field. 这允许您为列中的每个超链接设置不同的文本标题。This allows you to set a different text caption for each hyperlink in the column. 若要为列中的每一行指定相同的文本标题, 请设置属性, 而不是设置此属性。To specify the same text caption for each row in the column, set the property instead of this property. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 使用数据绑定时, 可以通过设置属性为超链接的文本标题指定自定义的显示格式。When you using data binding, you can specify a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定数据源中要绑定到中的超链接的文本标题的字段。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the field in the data source to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性为中的超链接的文本标题提供自定义的显示格式。 Use the property to provide a custom display format for the text caption of the hyperlinks in the . 仅当文本标题被数据绑定到数据源中的字段时, 才将指定格式应用于文本标题。The specified format is applied to the text caption only when the text caption is data bound to a field in a data source. 通过设置属性, 指定要绑定到列中超链接的文本标题的字段。Specify the field to bind to the text caption of the hyperlinks in the column by setting the property. 有关格式字符串的语法的信息, 请参阅。For information on the syntax of formatting strings, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置中的数据绑定文本标题的格式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to format the data-bound text captions in the . > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以使用属性指定的格式来设置数据绑定文本标题值的格式。 Use the method to format a data-bound text caption value with the format specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 DataGrid 中的所有项 (标头和表尾项除外) 创建超链接。HyperLinks are created for all items in the DataGrid except the Header and Footer items.

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击列中的超链接时链接到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 当单击列中的超链接时链接到的 URL。

span.span: The URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定单击列中的超链接时链接到的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL to link to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性后, 列中的所有超链接共享相同的 URL 链接。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same URL link. 若要为列中的每个超链接提供单独的 URL , 请使用属性。To provide a separate URL for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定链接到中的超链接的 URL。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the URL to link to for hyperlinks in the . 请注意, 列中的所有超链接都链接到同一个页面。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column link to the same page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/CS/hyperlinkcolumnsinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/VB/hyperlinkcolumnsinglevb.aspx#1)] 以下相应示例是在单击上一示例中的超链接时链接到的示例 Web 窗体页。The following corresponding example is a sample Web Forms page to link to when a hyperlink in the previous example is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/CS/detailspagesinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/VB/detailspagesinglevb.aspx#1)]

member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置单击列中的超链接时显示链接到的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame to display the Web page content that is linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 当单击列中的超链接时加载链接到的网页的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame to load the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定当单击列中的超链接时显示链接到的网页的框架或窗口。Use the property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page linked to when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. 如果未设置此属性, 则当单击列中的超链接时, 将刷新带有焦点的浏览器或窗口。If this property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when a hyperlink in the column is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现`target`为属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. XHTML `target` 1.1 文档`anchor`类型定义中不允许使用元素的属性。The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 如果的 呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1, 请不要设置属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1 compliant. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时, 强烈建议你避免使用属性来面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [NIB：ASP.NET 可](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)访问性。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以 a 到 Z 的字母 (不区分大小写) 开头, 但以下特殊值除外, 后者以下划线开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如, Internet Explorer 5.0 和更高版本支持`_search`目标值。For example, Internet Explorer 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定窗口, 以便在单击列中的超链接时显示链接到的网页的内容。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the window to display the contents of the Web page linked to when the hyperlink in the column is clicked. 此示例在新窗口中显示链接的网页。This example displays the linked Web page in a new window. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/CS/hyperlinkcolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnMain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnMain/VB/hyperlinkcolumnvb.aspx#1)] 以下相应示例显示了上一示例中所选的项。The following corresponding example displays the item selected in the previous example. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/CS/detailspagecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnDetails/VB/detailspagevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要为列中的超链接显示的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column.

value.span: 列中的超链接的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption for the hyperlinks in the column.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定为列中的超链接显示的文本标题。Use the property to specify the text caption to display for the hyperlinks in the column. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性后, 列中的所有超链接共享相同的文本标题。When this property is set, all hyperlinks in the column share the same text caption. 若要为列中的每个超链接提供单独的文本标题 , 请使用属性。To provide a separate text caption for each hyperlink in the column, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 不能同时设置和属性。The and properties cannot both be set at the same time. 如果同时设置了这两个属性, 则属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. > [!CAUTION] > 文本在中显示之前未经过 HTML 编码。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the . 这样就可以在文本的 HTML 标记中嵌入脚本。This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text. 如果此列的值来自用户输入, 请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities. 设置此属性后, 可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息, 请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性指定中的超链接的文本标题。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text caption for hyperlinks in the . 请注意, 列中的所有超链接都具有相同的文本标题。Notice that all hyperlinks in the column have the same text caption. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/CS/hyperlinkcolumnsinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingle/VB/hyperlinkcolumnsinglevb.aspx#1)] 以下相应示例是在单击上一示例中的超链接时链接到的示例 Web 窗体页。The following corresponding example is a sample Web Forms page to link to when a hyperlink in the previous example is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/CS/detailspagesinglecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkColumnSingleDetails/VB/detailspagesinglevb.aspx#1)]
